ResearchProjectDef.label: Plant pots
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Craft pots to grow flowers and herbs.
I thought clay must feel happy in the good potter's hand. Janet Fitch

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wax usage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce waxen flammable material that can be used to light surroundings, sculpt things or hermetizing stuff.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Material calcination
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to purify materials using heat. Practical use for example: making cement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dried foods
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build smokehouses to preserve certain food, extending their lifespan.
Where there is smoke there is fire. Proverb

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic butchering
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build a simple butchering spot to increase butchering speed and yield.
“Better the butcher than the meat.” - George R.R. Martin

ResearchProjectDef.label: Paperwork
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Use carefully prepared parchment to notate and share discoveries.
“Writing means sharing. It’s part of the human condition to want to share things – thoughts, ideas, opinions.” - Paulo Coelho

ResearchProjectDef.label: Religion symbols
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build monuments to the gods.
“Thus, the sculpture serves to give people one thought – ‘Everything is in God’s hands.’” - Sergey Semenov

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Art
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build a simple artisan station to craft art and trade goods.
“Skill without imagination is craftsmanship and gives us many useful objects such as wickerwork picnic baskets.” - Tom Stoppard

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glasswork
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to produce glass materials. Glass may be produced in places of great concentration of heat - for example fire pit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Embrasures
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build embrasures to safely repel invaders.
“We admire the castles, because we admire the security!” - Mehmet Murat ildan

ResearchProjectDef.label: Column making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Experimenting with walls may prove useful - so one may find out how to make wall thinner but still allow to support roof and stuff.
